channel.title: News on Kosuke Takahashi, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in News on Kosuke Takahashi, Ph.D.

item.title: 1. PAPER
item.description: Our paper entitled Structure of Multiple Mirror System From Kaleidoscopic Projections of Single 3D Point was accepted to IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI) (to appear). Its arXiv version is available here.

item.title: 2. INVITED TALK
item.description: I had an invited talk entitled Applications of Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Technologies in Aquaculture at CVIM/PRMU research meeting.

item.title: 3. Invited Talk
item.description: I had a tutorial lecture about camera calibration at SSII 2019. The lecture slide is here.
